img_summary: The image depicts a cluster of dark, textured mushrooms, likely representing the "Monkey-Head Fungus" mentioned in the following text. This item is classified as a rare ingredient in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong* and is obtained randomly from Snake-Head Mushrooms. It serves as part of the game's crafting or resource-gathering system.
